questions.question: Is the refrigerator in the edited image a cream-colored appliance with two horizontal chrome handles and a round dial on the upper door?
questions.explanation: In the edited image, the refrigerator depicted is indeed cream-colored. While it does have two horizontal handles resembling a chrome finish, there is no visible round dial on the upper door, based on the edited visual cues.

questions.explanation: The stove in the edited image does not display individual knobs, instead opting for a simpler design without distinct control features identifiable, reflecting a stylistic representation rather than detailed realism. None of the burners appear black.
